document_data.name: Djinni Caliphate
document_data.base: [[Citadel of Ice and Steel]], [[Elemental Plane of Air]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Djinni Caliphate''' was the collective term referring to the ruling body of government of the [[djinn]].
document_data.Organization:
The Great Caliph, [[Husam al-Balil ben Nafhat al-Yugayyim]], ruled over all of the [[noble djinni]] comprising the Djinni Caliphate.

Husam kept 20 of his most trusted followers near him at all times.
document_data.Activities: The Great Caliph and his court rarely left their stronghold. When they did it was usually a trip to [[Zakhara]] to create trouble for the great cities of the Land of Fate.
document_data.Base of Operations: The [[Citadel of Ice and Steel]] within the Elemental Plane of Air served as the seat of power for the Djinni Caliphate.
